name: Morrígu Disruptive
description:
Introducing the major players within the ranks of Generatives and Disruptives at Gormenghast.

Morrígu Disruptive – An assassin; and a slippery fucker at that.

Another of the Disruptive bloodlines that stretches through all time and each regenerated Morrigu retains all knowledge of what has occurred before, making them one of the most brutal forces to encounter.

Highly dangerous and never to be trusted.

PNG 4800 x 4800 || December 12th 2021 || Dark Art digital painting – expanding the Gormenghast origin universe
